A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The first that I saw it in the cinema I thought it has somewhat ok\, parts of it didn't make any sense at all but sure.\nRe-watched it for the first time in ages yesterday with my boyfriend and I was bored senseless when you know the \"twists\"  the whole thing is just mind-numbingly boring and gives the film almost nothing to look forward to\, I was happy when it ended.
